original_text: If indeed ye will magnify yourselves against me, and plead against me my reproach:
korean_text: 너희가 참으로 나를 향하여 자만하며 내게 수치스러운 행위가 있다고 증언하려면 하려니와

sentences.original_text: If indeed ye will magnify yourselves against me,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신들이 나에 대해 스스로를 크게 만들고자 한다면,

sentences.original_text: and plead against me my reproach:
